data.message:
Everybody from the 313 
One more time for old time sake
get your guts over fear & just lose yourself to sing for the moment
be not afraid & go BerZerk to do the square dance in wicked way like toy soldier
till you collapse coz its birthday of G.O.A.T ask Superman aka The Monster who entered
the Rap as Marshall Mathers, Fought as slim shady, Conquered as EMIN3M & now ruling as Rap GOD
Long Live #Slim Shady #EMIN3M
P.S - I hope you get this man, Hit me back just to chat.
Patiently waiting for #SHADYXV

replies.message: Miss You Big Proof... Living with out you is so miserable...
